channel.title: Adding in a simple quest
channel.description:
Is there a simple way to add quests to devolution 7.0 so like;
You talk to king harold. King harold asks you to slay the king black dragon once you kill kbd you talk to him again and you're rewarded with, 20 dragon bones and 50,000 str exp.

item.title: Adding in a simple quest
item.dc:creator: @kingman002 kingman002
item.description:
@kingman002 wrote:

[quote=“killer-bros-owner, post:5, topic:388211”]…The server help section is here to get help not too tell people to use google so if you can’t help, stop posting.

Anyone else?[/quote]
No, I’m helping by telling you to search. It’s released, if I find the link, you’ll be sorry.
EDIT: Not even 1 minute of searching and I found it.

moparisthebest.com

moparisthebest.com

programming, irc, cars

Read full topic

King harold asks you to slay the king black dragon
once you kill kbd you talk to him again and you’re rewarded with, 20 dragon bones and 50,000 str exp.[/quote]
